Name: [Deployed] Rocketboo
Desc: Active Skill: Mounts a rocket and charges at the target. Upon hitting a target, the rocket will explode, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> to enemies within range and accumulating <color=#FF5521>Fire Anomaly Buildup</color>.
Desc2: <color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack: Mounts a rocket and charges at the target. Upon hitting a target, the rocket will explode, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> to enemies in a large area and accumulating massive <color=#FF5521>Fire Anomaly Buildup</color>.</color>
